actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to authorize certain Federal agencies to detail personnel and to loan equipment to the Director of the National Marine Fisheries Service, National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.

summary.text: Directs the department in which the Coast Guard is operating, the Department of the Army, Department of the Navy, the Department of the Air Force, the Atomic Energy Commission, and the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to detail personnel and to loan equipment to the Director of the National Marine Fisheries Service, National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.

titles.title: A bill to authorize certain Federal agencies to detail personnel and to loan equipment to the Director of the National Marine Fisheries Service, National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.
